data.name: Sticky Apps
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO WISHLIST!


About the Software

Sticky Apps is a collections of featureful applications to make your PC experience more informative, useful, and all around fun. This software is titled "Sticky Apps" as each application can be stickied to your desktop, allowing for easy viewing of information.

Each Sticky App will have graphic design functionality including:

  • Exporting Images
  • Changing Colors
  • Graphic Image Sharing (in development)

The program is in EARLY ACCESS as more applications are being added. Here is information on 3 apps ready for release (with 2 more to come!):

CPU/GPU MONITOR

  • Quickly and easily see your CPU usage per-core and overall
  • Quickly see your GPU processing usage
  • Change colors scheme to fit your needs
  • Sticky this anywhere on your desktop

MONITOR YOUR PING

  • Monitor your ping to various servers on the Internet
  • Change the number of destinations you monitor
  • Change colors scheme to fit your needs
  • Sticky this anywhere on your desktop


NETWORK BANDWIDTH MONITOR

  • Shows your network connection information
  • Shows upload and download network usage in real-time
  • Shows total data transferred
  • 1 click button to enable/disable all Internet traffic
  • Ability to pin the application anywhere on your desktop
  • Ability to export/create graphic images of the state of your bandwidth
  • Sticky this anywhere on your desktop

2 MORE STICKY APPLICATIONS IN DEVELOPMENT

  • Two more applications are being developed
  • Total application goal: 5

data.short_description: Sticky Apps is a collections of fun applications to make your PC experience more informative, useful, and all around fun. This software is titled "Sticky Apps" as each application can be stickied to your desktop, allowing for easy viewing of information.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU
